name: Rikitia
tag_list: brasil, mobile, android, iphone, rio-de-janeiro, smartphone
overview: Rikitia is a well known outsourcing sales, marketing & services company, skilled on the I.T. Technologies, wich is on stage in the brazilian market from a long time, where achieved a leading position. We helps your company to meet it’s core objectives in a highly competitive, complex marketplace as is Brazil & South America. Our team has decades of experience and expertise in the political and economic landscape in Brazil. With a presence in Rio de Janeiro, Rikitia has close ties with leaders of the Brazilian business and investment communities, as well as strong relationships across the government. We are the bridge that speak and understand the different languages of business, government and civil society – and of diverse countries and cultures, We pride ourselves on being, and serving our clients as, a local voice. Our firm has the ability and flexibility to provide services anywhere in the South America. We want bring the best of the new tech companies to Brazil and Latin America. Is your company dying to enter or grow your business in the hyper growth market of Latin America? If yes, You should contact us.
